message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to accept $100 for it?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
